name: Magic Friends: Rainbow Hands
description:
Interesting and full of magical adventures, Magic Friends: Hands game is waiting for you!
Rather, become part of the magical world and meet old and new friends.
Together you need to defeat the enemies that will meet on the way!
And the magical abilities of your friends will definitely come in handy!



Features of Magic Friends: Rainbow Hands
- Bright 3D graphics;
- Simple management;
- Exciting gameplay;
- Intuitive interface.



Never be bored with Magic Friends: Rainbow Hands! After all, is it ever sad with friends? So let's go to new heights!
